edge: Michael Jackson inspired Manasva Roy (Michael) to become a dancer.
Manav Roy (Munna) is the adopted son of Manasva Roy (Michael).
Manav Roy (Munna) secretly visits dance clubs with his friends.
Michael Jackson asks Manav Roy (Munna) to give up dancing.
Balli clashes with Manav Roy (Munna).
Mahender Fauji asks Munna to teach him how to dance.
Mahender Fauji's brother Balli.
Mahender Fauji wants Manav Roy (Munna) to become a good dancer to impress Deepika 'Dolly' Sharma.
Deepika 'Dolly' Sharma and deepak sharma are related terms.
Desire for relationship, Maheender wants to impress Dolly with his dance skills, Dolly is a dancer in a club
Intermediary between Mahender and Dolly, Became friends after multiple meetings, Confided in about her dreams of becoming a renowned dancer
Generous gesture towards Dolly, Gifted her an appointment letter for the lead dancer role at Blue Star Hotel
Placed as a lead dancer, Gifted by Mahender
Tense relationship after false accusations by Balli, Dolly flees
Malicious intent towards Dolly, Lied that Mahender would only keep her as a sex slave
Anger and attempt to kill after discovering Balli's false accusations towards Dolly
Wanting to win the Dancing Star contest to face her father after running away from home for dancing career
Promise to get her back after losing her, Coincidentally finding Dolly in Mumbai for participating in Dancing Star
Helping Dolly win the Dancing Star contest by getting his friends to help her dance group, Lie about not being able to dance until she finds him dancing and training
friends; Munna lied to Dolly about dancing, but she found out and asked him to be her partner at the competition
love; Dolly told Mahender that she loves Munna in Delhi
relationship with father; Michael's father kidnapped him and gave Munna 24 hours to bring Dolly or his father would be killed
enmity; Balli tried to beat them up, but Munna defeated him and his goons
enmity; Balli tried to beat them up, but Munna defeated him and his goons
enmity; Mahender came to Mumbai in search of Dolly and kidnapped Michael because of Munna's betrayal
reconciliation; Mahender soon came to accept Munna and Dolly's love and made amends with Munna after Michael finally accepted his son's passion for dancing
